explains: n. [药] 镇静剂；能使安静的东西；止痛药
adj. 使镇静的；使安静的

sentences.en: They use opium as a sedative, rather than as a narcotic.
sentences.cn: 他们把鸦片作为镇静剂，而不是作为麻醉剂。

sentences.en: The sedative makes people very somnolent.
The patient is sedated with intravenous use of sedative drugs.
sentences.cn: 这名患者在静脉注射了镇静剂后镇静了下来。
